```{r loading packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```
The code below cleans the pups dataset and converts it from wide to long format.

```{r clean_pups}
pups_data = read_csv("./FAS_pups.csv") %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  gather(key = developmental_landmark, value = day, pd_ears:pd_walk) 
```
